data.name: Attack on Titan / A.O.T. Wings of Freedom
data.detailed_description:
An international hit anime "Attack on Titan" has come to Steam®!

Battle is joined between the man-eating Titans and Eren and his companions. Experience the illusion of being in the anime, and controlling the flow of the story.

The story from the anime, with a few original twists, is yours to experience!

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

data.short_description: An international hit anime "Attack on Titan" has come to Steam®! Battle is joined between the man-eating Titans and Eren and his companions. Experience the illusion of being in the anime, and controlling the flow of the story. The story from the anime, with a few original twists, is yours to experience!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 2.93GHz over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Pixel Shader 3.0 over 3D Accelerator chip , VRAM 1GB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 3.40GHz over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Pixel Shader 3.0 over 3D Accelerator chip , VRAM 2GB over

data.legal_notice:
Based on the manga "Shingeki no Kyojin" by Hajime Isayama originally serialized in the Monthly BESSATSU SHONEN magazine published by Kodansha Ltd.
